name: TheGameForum
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the game forum
des:
This applications provides a place for people to socialize and discuss Alexa games on Alexa itself. You can use geography based navigation to find your way around the environment. There are several chat rooms where you can meet up with other people and have real time conversations with them. There are also several bulletin boards for popular Alexa games where you can swap tips and tricks with other players.
Do you have a topic or interest that doesn't have a board? Just message the admin and new areas for discussion can be set up.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
